name: Elementary Gambler
description:
My first solo Game Jam, had so much fun!!

How to play: 

  • Try to match the colors of the discard pile with the ones from your hand.
  • If you think you don't have the color, bet about it.
  • Loose all of your cards to win.

Controls:

  • Move - arrow keys
  • Select - Z key
  • Bet - X key
